attributes.action: Keep driving tests going during the lockdown.
attributes.additional_details: Stopping driving lessons means that we have to get used to driving again, we have to wait longer to get tests booked and done. We have done everything the government has told us, it’s not fair if we aren’t allowed to carry on doing our driving because the government failed US. It is hard for people to commute to work and university with the additional rules in place, it’s not safe for us to get public transport as they’re  packed. Also theory tests last 2 years and theres no support in place.
attributes.background: Let practical driving tests continue whilst this lockdown! It’s not fair that schools are open yet people who actually need a mean of transportation aren’t allowed to go through with it. It’s not like we can learn how to do a practical test online!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462
